product.title: Snow White and the Messy Dwarfs | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Snow White and the Messy Dwarfs

Ever since Disney’s first full-length animated feature, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, Snow White and her seven friends have enchanted young readers. In this colorful retelling, Snow White pays a visit to the seven dwarfs while her prince is away, and is surprised to discover that Dopey, Sleepy, Doc, and the gang have slipped back into their poor housekeeping habits. Youngsters will be presented with the importance of household chores, teaching them to be responsible for their own spaces.

Tie-in Activity: Develop a chore chart with your child, outlining specific tasks he’ll be expected to tackle, such as making his bed or setting the table. Discuss the importance of everyone doing his or her part to keep the house tidy.
